name: Golf
title: How to start playing golf
description: First either buy new or used golf clubs. Then take them to the driving range and hit some balls. Watch some youtube videos then repeat.

name: Cooking
title: Keys to becoming a good chef
description: Besides techniques that you learn over time, it is important to eat out at other places as well. By trying other foods, it gives you and idea of flavors that you can incorporate with your cooking.

name: Coding
title: Keys to succeed in coding bootcamp
description: Rewatch past lectures so it stays in your head. Coding yourself allows you to learn more than just watching videos or other people coding.
